casebody.data:
No. 10-1283. Ellen Garman, Guardian and Next Friend of Apryl Garman, Petitioner v. Campbell County School District No. 1, et al. 565 U.S. 816, 132 S. Ct. 95,

181 L. Ed. 2d 24,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 6701. October 3, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 630 F.3d 977.
